PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-02501998-02-220TC,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Transport of DONALD PETTIT, of West Vancouver, British Columbia, as a director of the Board of Directos of VIA Rail Canada Inc. to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of Stan Hagen, whose term has expired.
Attachments
